context.summary: All DB/UI, Sub-App navigation, and governance enhancements complete. Canonical DB is single source of truth. System ready for OF-8.5 transition and UAT.
achievements: Enhanced Admin SubApps table with 5 new columns (createdAt, updatedAt, owner, linkedProjectsCount, governanceLogCount)
Implemented sorting and filtering functionality with real-time updates
Fixed Sub-App routing to resolve 404s on /orbis/sub-apps/:id
Implemented enriched Sub-App Overview page with tabbed operational context
Established canonical database as single source of truth
Removed all remaining mock data dependencies
Enhanced Sidebar v3.1 fully functional with Sub-App navigation
Complete CRUD operations for Projects, SubApps, and Phases
Live metrics integration with project counts and governance logs
Comprehensive UAT and QA evidence capture

qaEvidence.verification: all critical paths tested and working

outstandingItems.note: Team management API planned for future development
SDLC steps API planned for future development

context.impact: Pre-OF-GH Series fully closed with comprehensive Sub-App management system. All requested enhancements delivered and tested. System architecture ready for OF-8.5 transition.
